item.title: [DISTRELEC-3037] 2nd Company name not visible
item.description:
• Login as distrelec.testing+Koi@gmail.com (pw: distrelec)
  • Go to myAccount
  • Click on Company infos

-> You will see only the first company name, think there should be also the second company name.

comments.comment: Please include the second company name on a new line below the first company name.
Should it really be below first company name? See attached printscreen
I thought more like Second Company Name copy.png
ok adjusted and done.

attachment.name: Firmendaten Distrelec AT - Windows Internet Explorer_2014-02-03_13-31-59.jpg
attachment.author: mfretz

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3008] Headline Homepage: Padding left
item.description: check headline styles. on the homepage, a padding left is needed. maybe a solution exists already or another jira ticket. check and fix.

comments.comment: I don't think there already is another jira ticket.
done

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3001] Feedback Form - red text
item.description:
Please make the Red writting from this page, Black. http://test.distrelec.at/de//cms/feedback

Thanks!

comments.comment: Why is this due only on the 6th?

Hi All,

Since the text in question is within a Content Slot editable within the cms cockpit, the text needs to be changed there. Although, the H3 Title Color is always red, so either change the text to normal Text or then we have to discuss what we could do.

Hi Jan!

this page: Distrelec Content Catalog AT >> Staged >> Feedback Page - DIS-S

has only a header component. No text component.

Please indicate where is the page that has the editable text. Maybe I am on the wrong page.
Thanks!

Hi Oana,

My bad, indeed the text is within the "hardcoded" Form Part of the page. I adjusted the color of the text block. Is it ok to leave the text in that size? (Just because we leave from the convention here, to have H3 Elements with red color..?)
please make this regular paragraph, regular text size. thanks!

Hi Oana,

adjusted it accordingly, see printscreen

This is not fixed:

http://test.distrelec.at/de//cms/feedback
http://prod.distrelec.at.distrelec.com/de//cms/feedback
It's part of R1.1

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2959] Manufacturer Carousel: Add image padding in manufacturer octagons
item.description:
For elements within the manufacturer carousel, there is no padding for the manufacturer logos which are being displayed in the octagon shape. See screenshot.

Testpage: http://test.distrelec.at/de//cms/Testing

Please add padding (similar to category carousel).
item.summary: Manufacturer Carousel: Add image padding in manufacturer octagons

comments.comment: fixed, can be tested after deployment.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2923] Display countries of CMSsites having the same brand only
item.description:
CMSsite options (country, language, currency, channel) of a different brand would be visible in the settings dialog popup.
There are NO side effects since we currently only have the brand "Distrelec".
item.summary: Display countries of CMSsites having the same brand only

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2915] TS-5.5 No warning text appears (next to the categories) when not filling categories (newsletter)
item.description: No warning text appears above the categories that they are not filled out.
item.summary: TS-5.5 No warning text appears (next to the categories) when not filling categories (newsletter)

comments.comment: This is when registering for the newsletter. No error message when not selecting a category.

in order to validate the checkboxes in the FE, I have to merge both modules (newsletter-selection.jsp into form-newsletter.jsp) and then delete the newsletter-selection module. please provide the necessary BE changes so I can finish the FE validation (see TODO comment in form-newsletter.jsp).
The user don´t know what to do here. The warning text appears at the top (see screenshot) but should be next to the categories.
This has not been deployed yet and will only be fixed for CH/IT. Please retest again in the CH/IT release when deployed.

attachment.name: Newsletter Registrierung Distrelec CH Website - Google Chrome_2014-01-28_13-46-16.png
attachment.author: deurenius

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2891] Reduce DB size for developers
item.description:
PIM data constitutes the largest part of the database. PIM data does only enrich existing products already existing in hybris DB (coming from ERP).

Implementation hints:
On a development system we want to control the PIM import for products by a whitelist of categories. Only articles "below" the whitelisted categories shall be enriched with PIM data. Categoies of all levels down to "Produktlinie" can be mentioned.

cat-L1D_379513
cat-L3D_525476
cat-L3D_525393

Effort: 1-2 md

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2881] Send to a friend: "Enter" in textfield tries to send form
item.description:
When trying to send a product to a friend by mail, there is a textfield, in which the user can type in an complimentary message.

This text field does not allow linebreaks - i.e. when pressing enter, the website tries to send the form. Even if you create artificial linebreaks (by not filling out the captcha to prevent the form from being sent), they are being ignored in the actual mail.
item.summary: Send to a friend: "Enter" in textfield tries to send form

comments.comment:
Hi Beat,

can you please take care of this bug. Thank you in advance. Dean.
Enter does not submit the form anymore, besides if the focus is on the submit button

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2801] Default Settings (payment, delivery): wrong order of items
item.description:
in the settings page of my account, there are two errors in the order of list items:

  • Delivery Methods should be above Payment Methods
  • Within payment methods, Invoice should be above Credit Card

Basically it should be the same as on the order detail page of the checkout.
item.summary: Default Settings (payment, delivery): wrong order of items

comments.comment:
Changed the order of payment options and delivery options.

Could not change the order inside the payment options. Dishan, can you check this, I think you need to order them in the backend. In the Frontend, we just loop through the payment options..
done

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2766] Log - Including export time
item.description:
In the PIM Import logfile, there is no way to identify the import which is in cause.

Possible solutions would be:
a. Change the PIM file name from pattern "DIS_11_ger.xml" to "DIS_11_[timestamp]_ger.xml"
b. Change the application creating the log file to parse the export information out of the PIM Export file

comments.comment:
Hallo Önder,

Please try to implemente point a. Otherwise, we'll need to assign the ticket to Adrian.
a) is not possible in the moment
Deferred to Elfa Release
solution b) implemented.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2618] Changing images via arrow keys
item.description:
OS: OS X, 10.8.5
Browser: Firefox, 26.0

On product detail page: click on the magnifying glasses icon, in the opening window I can change the images only by click on an arrow at the left or the right of the windows. Could be a nice function to handle this via arrow keys too. (img_282_pzu)

comments.comment:
Florian,
while not useless, I think this is rather a nice-to-have feature. Please advise whether to pursue and prioritize this.
Discussed with Florian, to be re-prioritized in phase 2

Hi Jan,

can you please take care of this change request. Thank you in advance. Dean.
key navigation added

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2073] 'back' from order confirmation page: redirect to cart possible
item.description:
Currently, if the user uses the browser back function from an order confirmation page, he is taken back to the last step of the checkout process, sometimes with an error page, or with the page as it was in the cache.

Is it possible to redirect such a browser back to the (now usually empty) cart?
item.summary: 'back' from order confirmation page: redirect to cart possible

comments.comment: Rene, can you please answer this question and take necessary steps directly with Nando and Dean (make Change Request or Bug and then approve with Oana and/or implement)

René: "Werden bei History Back die Javascripts ausgeführt?"

Dominic: Bei Browser history.back siehst du deinen gefüllten Cart und das JS wird erneut ausgeführt.

—

Zum Ticket: Eine Möglichkeit wäre im BE den Referer abzufragen und wenn es die Order Confirmation Page ist Redirect zum Cart

Der history,back macht keinen Request auf den Server, sondern nimmt die Seite aus dem Cache.
Ich kann somit vom BE auch keinen Redirect machen.

Auch einige der Ajax calls (GET ) werden wohl gecached. <siehe screenshot>

Ich denke wir müssen das kurz besprechen.

Die GET Requests auf dieser Seite kann man mit cache:false ausführen, dann werden Sie nicht mehr gecached.

Wahrscheinlich läuft es auf eine Frontend Weiterleitung raus. Lass uns nächste Woche darüber reden, diese Woche muss ich ausschliesslich IE8 Bugfixing machen..

Discussed with René.

Is possible with FE and BE work. We need to do it outside of Terrific with some Javascript and an Ajax Call to the Backend.

Effort Estimation:
BE 1 d
FE 0.5 d

Hi Dishan,

can you please take care of this change request. Please brief Jan for the frontend work.

Added mapping in Backend.
TODO:
Make the ajax call and the redirect.
Frontend Added und successfully tested

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3030] Shopping List, favorite products List if empty and download webshop is crashing
item.description:
AT webshop
User : atmaindistrelec@gmail.com
pwd : at12345
If a list (shopping, favorite) is empty, you can download it and the webshop is crashing.
See screenshots.
item.summary: Shopping List, favorite products List if empty and download webshop is crashing

comments.comment: Indeed it is. The simplest way to solve this is probably to hide the download icon when a list is empty.

@Nando, as discussed, please decide what the behaviour should be, when the list is empty / gets empty after deleting all products from the list.

Options:
- Hide Button
- Disable Button
- still download File with no products in it
Please hide the button.
Button gets hidden. Done.
On 08/02/2014. Not solved. Button is not hidden if list is empty.

attachment.name: empty list - you download it and webshop is crashing.jpg
attachment.author: jlebec

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2840] AT - Printing issues
item.description:
distrelec.at
Printing issues. See attached PDFs.
For Product details, re-use product 969665. Issue is at similar product. Here the similar product is not avaiblable.
Order history : sorting block is not at the right place.

comments.comment:
Hi Lukas,

can you please take care of this bug. Thank you in advance. Dean.
-> this is not a BE issue.
fixed, can be tested after deployment.

Not ok.
The 2 issues are still there.

Jean, after deployment means after deployment ;-)
This was fixed for the 1.1 release, which will be available to test only in the coming weeks.
Printing issue when item is no more available. See new attachment on page 2.
